title: Crime Alert 01.31.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.31.19
description:
Men in ski masks violently attack star of the hit TV show ‘Empire’. Prison officials believe media behind a drone seen over the State Correctional Institute to get photos of funnyman Bill Cosby. Las Vegas police end their investigation into the deadliest mass shooting in modern US history.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
